text.section: Subject to subsection (b) of this section, a juvenile court shall rule on the adoption petition under this Part IV of this subtitle promptly but no later than 180 days after the petition is filed.

A juvenile court may not enter an order for adoption of a child under this Part IV of this subtitle before the later of:
30 days after the birth of the child; or
10 days after the notice is served under § 5-346 of this subtitle.
